law.catch_line: Content and effect of strategic economic development plan.

text.section:
Under each strategy, a discussion shall be provided of the objectives to be established within a set time frame, including:
Programs to be established and administered;
Funding required; and
Public policies to be pursued.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 13, effective July 14, 1992.
